docs.title: MkDocs with Catppuccin Theme!!!
docs.text: Welcome to the MkDocs documentation with full support for all 4 Catppuccin flavors!

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
This project demonstrates how to integrate the beautiful Catppuccin color palette into your MkDocs documentation. You get access to all 4 official flavors:

  • Latte 🌅 - Light theme for daytime work
  • Frappé 🌆 - Cool dark theme
  • Macchiato 🌃 - Warm dark theme
  • Mocha 🌌 - Warmest dark theme

docs.title: 🎨 All 4 Catppuccin Flavors
docs.text: Users can easily switch between all four themes using the toggle button in the header.

docs.title: 🎯 Full Integration with Material for MkDocs
docs.text:
• Support for all Material theme components
  • Optimized colors for code syntax highlighting
  • Beautiful tables and admonitions
  • Smooth transitions between themes

docs.title: 📝 Code Syntax Support
docs.text: All themes include optimized syntax highlighting for various programming languages.

docs.title: 🔍 Enhanced Search
docs.text: Integrated search with support for all Catppuccin themes.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text: Check out the Configuration Guide for detailed instructions on integrating Catppuccin into your project.

docs.title: Code Blocks
docs.text:
def hello_catppuccin():
    """Example function with Catppuccin highlighting"""
    colors = {
        "latte": "#eff1f5",
        "frappe": "#303446",
        "macchiato": "#24273a",
        "mocha": "#1e1e2e"
    }
    return colors

# Test the function
flavors = hello_catppuccin()
print(f"Available flavors: {', '.join(flavors.keys())}")

// JavaScript with beautiful highlighting
const catppuccinFlavors = ['latte', 'frappe', 'macchiato', 'mocha'];

function switchTheme(flavor) {
    if (catppuccinFlavors.includes(flavor)) {
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-md-color-scheme', flavor);
        localStorage.setItem('theme', flavor);
    }
}

// Apply saved theme
const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'mocha';
switchTheme(savedTheme);

// TypeScript example
interface CatppuccinTheme {
    name: string;
    type: 'light' | 'dark';
    colors: {
        base: string;
        text: string;
        primary: string;
        accent: string;
    };
}

const mochaTheme: CatppuccinTheme = {
    name: 'mocha',
    type: 'dark',
    colors: {
        base: '#1e1e2e',
        text: '#cdd6f4',
        primary: '#cba6f7',
        accent: '#89b4fa'
    }
};

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:
Note

This is an example of an admonition with the Catppuccin theme. It looks great in all 4 flavors!

Pro Tip

Try switching the theme using the button in the header to see all the variations!

Important

Make sure you correctly configure the paths to CSS files in your mkdocs.yml.

Information

Catppuccin is a cozy pastel theme available for a wide variety of applications and developer tools.

Success

You've successfully configured Catppuccin for your MkDocs project!

Danger

Modifying core CSS variables may break the theme consistency.

docs.title: Tables
docs.text: Flavor Type Base Color Best For Latte Light #eff1f5 Daytime reading Frappé Dark #303446 Low-light environments Macchiato Dark #24273a Evening work Mocha Dark #1e1e2e Night owls

docs.title: Features of each flavor:
docs.text:
Latte (Light Theme) - High contrast for bright environments - Easy on the eyes in daylight - Professional appearance - Perfect for printing

Frappé (Cool Dark) - Balanced contrast - Cooler color temperature - Great for extended coding sessions - Reduces eye strain

Macchiato (Warm Dark) - Warmer color palette - Comfortable for evening use - Pleasant visual experience - Good for creative work

Mocha (Warmest Dark) - Deepest blacks - Highest contrast in dark themes - Ideal for late-night coding - Minimal blue light

docs.title: Available Colors
docs.text:
Each flavor includes these color tokens:

Token Purpose base, mantle, crust Background colors surface0, surface1, surface2 Surface layers overlay0, overlay1, overlay2 Overlay elements subtext0, subtext1 Secondary text text Primary text lavender, blue, sapphire, sky Blue shades teal, green Green shades yellow, peach Yellow/orange shades maroon, red Red shades mauve, pink Purple/pink shades flamingo, rosewater Pastel shades

docs.title: About Catppuccin
docs.text: Catppuccin is a community-driven pastel theme that aims to be the middle ground between low and high contrast themes. It provides soothing pastel colors with excellent readability.
